name: Secure Communications Tactics
description: Defensive strategies to protect digital and real-world communications from interception, surveillance, and compromise.

cards.title: Understanding Encryption and Secure Messaging
cards.description: Deploying end-to-end encryption and anonymous communication methods.
bulletpoints: Using Signal, PGP, and other encryption tools effectively.
Understanding metadata leaks and mitigation tactics.

cards.title: Defending Against Communication Surveillance
cards.description: Identifying and mitigating threats from wiretapping, digital eavesdropping, and AI-assisted surveillance.
bulletpoints: Avoiding honey traps and social engineering setups.
Implementing voice distortion and obfuscation techniques.
Understanding SIGINT and how to counteract tracking.

cards.title: Operational Security (OpSec) for Secure Messaging
cards.description: Building effective OpSec habits for secure, anonymous communication.
bulletpoints: Creating burner identities and compartmentalizing online presence.
Understanding the risks of digital footprints and metadata.
Implementing multi-layered security for sensitive operations.
